title: I'm scared ill get banned
body:
So today I did something really dumb ( I'm unranked).
Our base was getting killed and I didn't know, so I started to kill a rift scuttler and I completely forgot I had an ult (I was soraka). We lost the game and ppl reported me for trolling
I also had a toxic vayne

replies.body:
Is it a dumb move? Yes. Will you be punished for it? No.

If you stated in chat that you were unwilling to help your team win, then this action/chat would be reportable.

There is absolutely no chance of being punished for this. Reports do nothing except trigger a review. the review finds nothing, it actually penalizes the report credibility of the reporter - or at least used to.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AEtHabko,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-06T00:08:16.544+0000)
>
> There is absolutely no chance of being punished for this. Reports do nothing except trigger a review. the review finds nothing, it actually penalizes the report credibility of the reporter - or at least used to.

But I could see how someone else would think I'm trolling

If that's trolling, 90% of Bronze 5 players would have been banned by now. Bad play =/= trolling. I think everyone's forgotten they have ult up at some point. I don't think Riot wants to ban a majority of their player base for forgetfulness.
Report credibility has ceased to exist.

I think I would report a raka trying to kill scuttler for trolling regardless of whether or not our base was being destroyed.
exdee

Dude honestly with the amount of toxic people you see in every game, it is IMPOSSIBLE to be banned... This is pretty minor compared to people calling me the n word, who have yet to ben banned for even a day

no worries. being a moron is not reportable. (hence why I haven't been permabanned yet)

People troll multiple games over the course of months and are never banned. Don't worry about it, just don't use chat.
lol im way to scared thanks for the feedback

Of course you'll be banned...

You tried to kill a rift scuttler! Theyre so cute!

(But in realness, no, you wont be banned, dont worry.)
Nah, you won't get banned, it's not that much of big deal.

What were you doing trying to hilariously kill a rift scuttler while presumably your team is having a fight with the other team (hence why they wanted your ult)?  While that in and of itself is not worthy of a ban, but it does sound like you were trolling or I have to wonder why were you not with your team even if you are losing and having a final fight at your nexus.
